mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_id desc

select rownum rn, notice_id, notice_writer, notice_title from(select rownum rn, notice_id, notice_writer, notice_title from(select notice_id, notice_writer, notice_title from notice order by notice_id desc) a where rownum <= (#{page}*10)) b where b.rn > (#{page}-1)*10
mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_id, notice_writer, notice_title, notice_subject, attach) values(notice_seq.nextval, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeSubject}, #{attach})
mapper.update: update notice set hit_count = hit_count+1 where notice_id = #{nid}
